resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108461</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108461</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Som</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήχος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sonido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This simulation lets you see sound waves. Adjust the frequency, volume, and harmonic content and you can see and hear how the wave changes. Move the 'listener' around and hear what she hears.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Simulation läßt Sie Schallwellen sehen. 
Justieren Sie die Frequenz, Datenträger, und harmonischer 
Inhalt und Sie können sehen und hören, wie die Welle ändert. 
Verschieben Sie den ' Zuhörer ' herum und hören Sie, was sie 
hört.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette simulation vous laisse voir les vagues 
saines. Ajustez la fréquence, volume, et le contenu et vous 
harmoniques pouvez voir et entendre comment la vague change. 
Déplacez l''auditeur 'autour et entendez ce qu'elle entend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta simulação deixa-o ver ondas sadias. 
Ajuste a freqüência, volume, e o índice e você harmonic 
podem ver e ouvir-se como a onda muda. Mova ' o ouvinte ' ao 
redor e ouça-se o que se ouve.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa simulazione li lascia vedere le onde 
sonore. Registri la frequenza, volume ed il soddisfare e voi 
armonici possono vedere e sentirsi come l'onda cambia. Sposti 
'l'ascoltatore 'intorno e sentasi che cosa si sente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η προσομοίωση σας αφήνει να δείτε τα 
υγιή κύματα. Ρυθμίστε τη συχνότητα, την ένταση του ήχου, 
και το αρμονικό περιεχόμενο και μπορείτε να δείτε και να
ακούσετε πώς το κύμα αλλάζει. Κινήστε το "ακροατή" γύρω 
και ακούστε τι ακούει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta simulación le deja considerar ondas 
acústicas. Ajuste la frecuencia, volumen, y el contenido y 
usted armónicos pueden considerar y oír cómo la onda cambia. 
Mueva a ' módulo de escucha ' alrededor y oiga lo que ella oye.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108461</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sound</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
